reqs:
***THIS IS A 3 CREDIT COURSE TAUGHT OVER 2 TERMS FROM SEPT 2017 TO APR 2018.
This is an online course that will begin with on-site contact/class time over a 2-day period at the UBC Vancouver campus on August 28-29, 2017, held in Irving Barber, room 155. (Residential, in person attendance required).
Synchronous (live webinars) - Sept 14, 21, 28; October 5, 12, 2017 - Jan. 18, Feb. 15, April 5, 12, 2018
Other asynchronous (pre-recorded) webinar dates are flexible and at the coaches discretion, usually aligned alongside the synchronous dates.
ASSIGNMENT #1 DUE NOV. 3, 2017
ASSIGNMENT #2 DUE APRIL 13, 2018
**Students should only enroll in this course if they are able to attend both the residential as well as on-line "synchronous" component.
Course outline can be found at: http://kin.educ.ubc.ca/current-students/current-graduate-students/#Courses-0
courseName: Psychology of Leadership and Group Processes
description: Contemporary theory, research and application with regard to leadership and group processes in the context of sport and exercise.
